description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A History of Ireland, from its first settlement to the present time; including a particular account of its literature, music, architecture, and national resources; with ... sketches of its eminent men interspersed with a great number of Irish melodies, etc" Author: MOONEY, Thomas. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1325.g.11." Page: 681 Place of Publishing: Boston [Mass.] Date of Publishing: 1846 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002537651 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
